revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5

place.placeName: Soṭa Däbrä Sälam Qǝddus Mikaʾel Mädḫane ʿAläm / Soṭa Mikaʾel
place.settlement: wäräda Ganta ʾAfäšum, ṭabiya Hädǝnnät, qušät Soṭa

note.desc: Local tradition tells that the church was founded in the time of King Zärʾa Yaʿqob (r. 1434-68).
note.ab: Däbr. There are one recently built and one older round church at the site. Tabots (3): Mädḫane ʿAläm, Michael, George.

23 Mss. photographed:SDM-001 "Four Gospels"; SDM-001a "Collection of Marain prayers"; SDM-002 "Miracles of Jesus"; SDM-003 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; SDM-003a "The Miracles of St. Michael, The Miracles of Gäbrä Mänfäs Qǝddus, etc."; SDM-004 "Missal"; SDM-005 "Miracles of Mary"; SDM-006 "The Book of the Baptismal Rite"; SDM-007 "Barǝkännä Ǝgziʾnä, Mäṣḥafä Aslǝṭi"; SDM-008 "Missal"; SDM-009 "The Homily of St. Michael"; SDM-010 "Synaxarion (second half of the year)"; SDM-011 "The Book of the Rite of the Passion Week"; SDM-012 "The Prayer of the Incense"; SDM-013 "The Book of the Funeral Rite"; SDM-014 "Synaxarion (first half of the year)"; SDM-015 "Miracles of Mary"; SDM-016 "The Book of Aslǝṭi"; SDM-017 "The Homiliy of the Saviour of the world"; SDM-018 "The Five Pillars of Mystery"; SDM-019 "Collection of Mälkǝʿ and other Texts"; SDM-020 "The Loosening of the Spell"; SDM-021 "Collection of protective prayers"; SDM-022 "The Bandlet of Righteousnes"
